subject: Olympic Games (2008)
Running
lead_paragraph: Bernard Lagat, who won two Olympic medals for Kenya, qualified for his first U.S. Olympic team by winning the 5,000 meters at the track and field trials in Oregon.
snippet: Bernard Lagat, who won two Olympic medals for Kenya, qualified for his first U.S. Olympic team by winning the 5,000 meters at the track and field trials in Oregon.
